table.label: qcranges
table.title: Quality Control Ranges
table.description: Data ranges for use in quality control

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: url
rowAttribute.title: Link to review page
rowAttribute.description: Link to a web page providing background information.

rowAttribute.label: vid
rowAttribute.title: Variable
rowAttribute.description: Link to variable record

rowAttribute.label: valid_min
rowAttribute.title: Minimum expected value for this variable.
rowAttribute.description: The minimum expected value will be used, if set, in quality control tests, and files containing data values below this value will be marked as containing errors.

rowAttribute.label: valid_max
rowAttribute.title: Maximum expected value for this variable.
rowAttribute.description: The maximum expected value will be used, if set, in quality control tests, and files containing data values above this value will be marked as containing errors.

rowAttribute.label: ok_min_mean_abs
rowAttribute.title: Minimum expected value of the global mean absolute value at each point in time
rowAttribute.description: This value, if set, will be used in quality control tests, and files containing data values above this value will be marked as containing errors.

rowAttribute.label: ok_max_mean_abs
rowAttribute.title: Maximum expected value of the global mean absolute value at each point in time
rowAttribute.description: This value, if set, will be used in quality control tests, and files containing data values above this value will be marked as containing errors.

rowAttribute.label: valid_min_status
rowAttribute.title: Status of valid_min
rowAttribute.description: Indicates the degree of confidence in the valid_min value provided. Valid values are robust, suggested or tentative. Robust values are based on previous results from a broad range of models with consistent output or on clear physical constraints.

rowAttribute.label: valid_max_status
rowAttribute.title: Status of valid_max
rowAttribute.description: Indicates the degree of confidence in the valid_max value provided. Valid values are robust, suggested or tentative. Robust values are based on previous results from a broad range of models with consistent output or on clear physical constraints.

rowAttribute.label: ok_min_mean_abs_status
rowAttribute.title: Status of ok_min_mean_abs
rowAttribute.description: Indicates the degree of confidence in the value ok_min_mean_abs provided. Valid values are robust, suggested or tentative. Robust values are based on previous results from a broad range of models with consistent output or on clear physical constraints.

rowAttribute.label: ok_max_mean_abs_status
rowAttribute.title: Status of ok_mx_mean_abs
rowAttribute.description: Indicates the degree of confidence in the value ok_max_mean_abs provided. Valid values are robust, suggested or tentative. Robust values are based on previous results from a broad range of models with consistent output or on clear physical constraints.

table.label: places
table.title: Places, States or Reservoirs
table.description: An abstract entity defining an extensive quantity of something, e.g. liquid water, suspended carbon.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: pid
rowAttribute.title: Parent Entity
rowAttribute.description: A place, state or reservoir containing this one.

table.label: transfers
table.title: Transfers of Material
table.description: Quantities expressing the transfer of material from one 'place' to another.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: frid
rowAttribute.title: Source Identifier
rowAttribute.description: Identifier of the 'place' that the flux is from.

rowAttribute.label: toid
rowAttribute.title: Target Identifier
rowAttribute.description: Identifier of the 'place' that the flux is to.

rowAttribute.label: isOneWay
rowAttribute.title: Unidirectional Flag
rowAttribute.description: Set true if the flux is associated with a physical process which only transfers mass in one direction. E.g.

rowAttribute.label: signInverted
rowAttribute.title: Sign Inversion
rowAttribute.description: Sign Inverted should be set True for one way fluxes if the variable is defined to be negative definite. The competing constraints of CF Standard Name protocols and domain usage can cuase problems with the sign convention.

rowAttribute.label: vid
rowAttribute.title: Variable Identifier
rowAttribute.description: Identifier of the 'CMORvar' associated with the flux.

table.label: units
table.title: Units
table.description: The units of the parameters defined in the {var} section. The 'text' attribute carries a plain text representation of the units of measure (e.g. m s-1) or, for dimensionaless variables, a scaling factor (e.g. 1.e-9) to be used for the variable.

rowAttribute.label: label
rowAttribute.title: Record Label
rowAttribute.description: Mnemonic label for record

rowAttribute.label: title
rowAttribute.title: Record Title
rowAttribute.description: Title of record

rowAttribute.label: group
rowAttribute.title: Group
rowAttribute.description: A group, designated by a string value, expresses a relationship between units.

rowAttribute.label: text
rowAttribute.title: Text representation of units
rowAttribute.description: Plain text representation with no special characters
